page.description: Runs an Export operation without displaying any prompts
page.syntax: C export.run_silent(C layoutname [,C filter [,C order [,* arguments ]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created export operation.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records to export.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

page.discussion: The EXPORT.RUN_SILENT() method exports data using a previously defined export operation, but without user interaction.
